= Pre-processing routines =

The following routines are available in the Toolbox:

 * [#Data_time_start_redefinition_-_timeStartPP Data time start redefinition    - timeStartPP]
 * [#Data_time_offset_-_timeOffsetPP Data time offset                - timeOffsetPP]
 * [#Metadata_time_offset_-_timeMetaOffsetPP Metadata time offset            - timeMetaOffsetPP]
 * [#Variable_scale/offset_-_variableOffsetPP Variable scale/offset           - variableOffsetPP]
 * [#Relative_pressure_calculation_-_pressureRelPP Relative pressure calculation   - pressureRelPP]
 * [#Depth_calculation_-_depthPP Depth calculation               - depthPP]
 * [#Salinity_calculation_-_salinityPP Salinity calculation            - salinityPP]
 * [#Variable_transformation_-_transformPP Variable transformation         - transformPP]
 
The following variable transformation is available in the toolbox:

 * [#Voltage_to_concentration_oxygen_data_transformation_-_sbe43OxygenTransform Voltage to concentration oxygen data transformation - sbe43OxygenTransform]
